title: Is it permissible to have adhkar stickers in washing (wudu) area of the washroom? assim al hakeem
transcript: in my in my University last year there was like stickers stickers of like to say after W and stuff and then uh these these stickers like uh they were just outside the toilets where people like wash their hands and stuff it's not a very proper place and I didn't know that we had to remove them from such places no you don't have to remove them a as long as they're not in this same toilet Cube there's no problem in having them are they in the toilet Cube no but like the place in the washing area in the washing area yes no no problem inshallah okay
